benchmark_details.name: OmniGenBench
benchmark_details.overview: OmniGenBench is a framework dedicated to genomic foundation model (GFM) benchmarking. It standardizes benchmark suites and automates benchmarking for a wide range of open-source GFMs, integrating millions of genomic sequences across hundreds of genomic tasks from large-scale benchmarks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To address the challenges of GFM benchmarking and application by providing a comprehensive software platform for genomic analysis.

data.source: Various genomic datasets accessed and integrated from public databases and existing benchmarks.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on evaluation protocols specified in benchmark suites.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance on genomic tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: OmniGenome was evaluated against various open-source GFMs across multiple benchmarks.
methodology.validation: Standardized benchmark protocols ensure reproducibility and reliability in evaluation.
